channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No 30 mph sign, 4th August
item.description:
Turning right from Old Gloucester Road onto Cheltenham Road East there is not one 30 mph speed sign. There are plenty of SLOW signs painted on the road surface but no road speed restriction signs. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 4th August
item.description:
Road closure28 day plus temporary footway closure 28 day required please relay x1 raised kerb stone 150x900x22mm stats required (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 4th August
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure required please replace x1 broken rocking dropped kerb stone 150x900x30mm stats required 10x5 (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 4th August
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure required please replace x1 broken chipped kerb stone 150x900x40mm stats required 10x6 (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)

item.title: Drain cover exposed above the road level, 3rd August
item.description:
Going south on New Road.the drain is exposed above the road level due to the road surface falling away.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury

item.title: Dumped Ringways traffic cone., 3rd August
item.description:
Someone has dumped a Ringways traffic cone at the ingress to Woodgate Close/public footpath, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham. Next time a contractorâ€™s crew is passing by, could they please recover it, Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Woodgate Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Carriage way cover, 3rd August
item.description:
There is a manhole in the main road outside windrush house and the local shops, the cover is extremely loose, as cars drive over it the cover dips causing the "banging, clanging" noise- not only is unsafe for drivers but also a noise nuisance as the local residents can hear the banging, clanking noise through the evening and early mornings as cars, lorries drive over it. please repair ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken pipework in council owned grass verge next to public footpath, 3rd August
item.description:
There is a broken pipe and other metalwork pushing through the grass on the council owned grass verge between the public footpath and 14 Alverton Drive.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: 2 drains blocked, standing water creating potholes and pedestrians get splashed, 3rd August
item.description:

item.title: Disgusting public toilets, 2nd August
item.description:
Pitville Park toilets are run down, graphiti d and stink. They need new toilets, urinals and tiling They are used by thousands of visitors to our town and residents, daily They are a very poor reflection on our town
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 84, All Saints' Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
